text: Antonio Mercero Juldain (7 March 1936 - 12 May 2018) was a Spanish movie and television director and screenwriter. He was born in Lasarte-Oria, Spain. Mercero was best known as the director of a 1972 surrealist short horror movie titled La cabina. He won an Emmy Award. His 1998 movie A Time for Defiance was entered into the 21st Moscow International Film Festival where it won the Special Silver St. George. In 2010 he was awarded a Honorary Goya Award (Goya de Honor).
